wikitext.*:
'''Rúmil''' can refer to:
* [[Rúmil (elf of Tirion)|Rúmil]], the [[Noldorin]] lore-master and elf-sage of [[Tirion]] in [[Valinor]].
** '''Alphabet of Rúmil''', or ''[[Sarati]]'', the first writing system as devised by Rúmil.
** ''[[i Equessi Rúmilo]]'', "The Sayings of Rúmil", word-of-mouth lore on early days of the [[Eldar]] in [[Aman]].
* [[Rúmil (elf of Lórien)|Rúmil]], a [[Silvan Elves|Silvan]] border-guard of [[Lothlórien]] and brother of [[Haldir]] and [[Orophin]].
